presets.content:
This book was reviewed by the Basic Education Curriculum and Programs Division of the Ministry of Basic, Higher and Technical Education.


First Edition, 2022 by the U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) through the ABC+: Advancing Basic Education in the Philippines Project.


ABC+ is a project of the Department of Education (DepEd) in partnership with the U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) and implemented by RTI International, together with The Asia Foundation, SIL LEAD, and Florida State University. ABC+ also works in partnership with the Ministry of Basic, Higher and Technical Education (MBHTE) and the University of the Philippinesâ€™s National Institute for Science and Mathematics Development (UP NISMED).
